AppConfigs.ConfigDescriptor:
<Application id="edu.emory.GreetingApplication"> <FullName>Greeting Application</FullName> <Description>A sample application that greets people with greetings generated by the Enterprise Greeting Service. This is an elementary example of accessing an OpenEAI service, a "Hello World!" example.</Description> <Configuration> <LoggerConfigs><LoggerConfig name="Logger"> <ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.LoggerConfig</ConfigClass> <Property><PropertyName>log4j.rootCategory</PropertyName><PropertyValue>INFO, stdout</PropertyValue></Property><Property><PropertyName>log4j.appender.stdout</PropertyName><PropertyValue>org.apache.log4j.FileAppender</PropertyValue></Property><Property><PropertyName>log4j.appender.stdout.File</PropertyName><PropertyValue>c:/toolkit-examples-3.0/logs/GreetingApplication.log</PropertyValue></Property><Property><PropertyName>log4j.appender.stdout.layout</PropertyName><PropertyValue>org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout</PropertyValue></Property><Property><PropertyName>log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern</PropertyName><PropertyValue>%-4d{ISO8601} %-5p [%t] %3x - %m%n</PropertyValue></Property></LoggerConfig></LoggerConfigs><ScheduledAppConfigs><ScheduledAppConfig name="GreetingApplicationConfig" scheduleCheckInterval="2000" type="application"> <Schedules isImmediate="true" runMechanism="Thread"> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.afa.Schedule</ObjectClass>
<Schedule name="GreetingGeneration" isImmediate="true" runMechanism="Thread"> <Commands inboundXmlValidation="false" outboundXmlValidation="false" writeToFile="false">
<Command type="scheduled" isDefault="false" inboundXmlValidation="false" outboundXmlValidation="false" writeToFile="false" isAbsolute="false"> <CommandName>GreetingGenerationCommand</CommandName> <CommandClass>org.any_openeai_enterprise.services.egs.commands.GreetingGenerationCommand</CommandClass> <Configuration> <ProducerConfigs><ProducerConfig numberOfProducers="5" tempQueuePoolSize="5" name="P2pEgsProducer" startOnInitialization="true" transacted="false" deliveryMode="PERSISTENT"> <DestinationName>cn=GreetingApplicationProxyQueue</DestinationName> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.jms.producer.PointToPointProducer</ObjectClass> <ConnectionFactoryName>cn=GreetingApplicationProducerQCF</ConnectionFactoryName><InitialContextFactory>com.sonicsw.jndi.mfcontext.MFContextFactory</InitialContextFactory><ProviderURL>tcp://intsonicdev1.cc.emory.edu:2506</ProviderURL><SecurityPrincipal>not used by OpenJMS</SecurityPrincipal><SecurityCredentials>not used by OpenJMS</SecurityCredentials><ProducerIdURL>localhost</ProducerIdURL><ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.ProducerConfig</ConfigClass></ProducerConfig></ProducerConfigs><MessageObjectConfigs><MessageObjectConfig name="Greeting" deferInitialization="false" xmlDocumentValidation="false" translationType="application"><SenderAppId>org.any-school-district.GreetingApplication</SenderAppId><Authentication> <UserId>egs</UserId> </Authentication><CommandName>GreetingRequest</CommandName><PrimedXmlDocuments><PrimedXmlDocument type="generate">message/releases/org/any-openeai-enterprise/CoreApplication/Greeting/1.0/xml/Generate-Request.xml</PrimedXmlDocument></PrimedXmlDocuments><ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.MessageObjectConfig</ConfigClass><ObjectClass>org.any_openeai_enterprise.moa.jmsobjects.coreapplication.v1_0.Greeting</ObjectClass><EnterpriseObjectDocument docUri="c:/toolkit-examples-3.0/configs/messaging/Environments/Examples/EnterpriseObjects/3.0/org/any-openeai-enterprise/CoreApplication/1.0/GreetingEO.xml" ignoreMissingFields="true" ignoreValidation="false" /><LayoutManager>
<InputLayout type="xml"> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.layouts.XmlLayout</ObjectClass> </InputLayout><OutputLayout type="xml"> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.layouts.XmlLayout</ObjectClass> </OutputLayout></LayoutManager></MessageObjectConfig><MessageObjectConfig name="Greetee" deferInitialization="false" xmlDocumentValidation="false" translationType="application"><SenderAppId>org.any-school-district.GreetingApplication</SenderAppId><Authentication> <UserId>egs</UserId> </Authentication><CommandName> </CommandName><ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.MessageObjectConfig</ConfigClass><ObjectClass>org.any_openeai_enterprise.moa.objects.resources.v1_0.Greetee</ObjectClass><EnterpriseObjectDocument docUri="c:/toolkit-examples-3.0/configs/messaging/Environments/Examples/EnterpriseObjects/3.0/org/any-openeai-enterprise/Resources/1.0/GreeteeEO.xml" ignoreMissingFields="true" ignoreValidation="false" /><LayoutManager> <InputLayout type="xml"> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.layouts.XmlLayout</ObjectClass> </InputLayout><OutputLayout type="xml"> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.layouts.XmlLayout</ObjectClass> </OutputLayout></LayoutManager></MessageObjectConfig></MessageObjectConfigs><ThreadPoolConfigs><ThreadPoolConfig name="GreetingGenerationThreadPool" maxThreads="30" minThreads="0" maxIdleTime="1" checkBeforeProcessing="false"><ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.ThreadPoolConfig</ConfigClass><ObjectClass>org.openeai.threadpool.ThreadPoolImpl</ObjectClass></ThreadPoolConfig></ThreadPoolConfigs><PropertyConfigs><PropertyConfig name="GreetingGenerationCommandProperties" refresh="false">
<ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.PropertyConfig</ConfigClass><Property><PropertyName>useThreads</PropertyName><PropertyValue>false</PropertyValue></Property><Property><PropertyName>inputFileName</PropertyName><PropertyValue>configs/messaging/Environments/Examples/InputFiles/GreetingApplication/greetees.txt</PropertyValue></Property></PropertyConfig></PropertyConfigs></Configuration> </Command></Commands> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.afa.Schedule</ObjectClass></Schedule></Schedules> <ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.ScheduledAppConfig</ConfigClass><ObjectClass>org.openeai.afa.ScheduledApp</ObjectClass><ThreadPoolConfig name="Standard" maxThreads="30" minThreads="0" maxIdleTime="1" checkBeforeProcessing="false"> <ConfigClass>org.openeai.config.ThreadPoolConfig</ConfigClass> <ObjectClass>org.openeai.threadpool.ThreadPoolImpl</ObjectClass> </ThreadPoolConfig></ScheduledAppConfig></ScheduledAppConfigs></Configuration> </Application>
